argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | modnegd.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) |
| 2 |  | modnegd.2 | |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) |
| 3 |  | modnegd.3 | |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) |
| 4 |  | modnegd.4 | |- ( ph -> ( A mod C ) = ( B mod C ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_1zzd | |- ( ph -> 1 e. ZZ ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_znegcld | |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. ZZ ) |
| 7 |  | #P_modmul1 | |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR ) /\ ( -u 1 e. ZZ /\ C e. RR+ ) /\ ( A mod C ) = ( B mod C ) ) -> ( ( A x. -u 1 ) mod C ) = ( ( B x. -u 1 ) mod C ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 6, 3, 4, 7 | #P_syl221anc | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. -u 1 ) mod C ) = ( ( B x. -u 1 ) mod C ) ) |
| 9 | 1 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) |
| 10 |  | #P_1cnd | |- ( ph -> 1 e. CC ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_negcld | |- ( ph -> -u 1 e. CC ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ph -> ( A x. -u 1 ) = ( -u 1 x. A ) ) |
| 13 | 9 | #P_mulm1d | |- ( ph -> ( -u 1 x. A ) = -u A ) |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( A x. -u 1 ) = -u A ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. -u 1 ) mod C ) = ( -u A mod C ) ) |
| 16 | 2 | #P_recnd | |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) |
| 17 | 16, 11 | #P_mulcomd | |- ( ph -> ( B x. -u 1 ) = ( -u 1 x. B ) ) |
| 18 | 16 | #P_mulm1d | |- ( ph -> ( -u 1 x. B ) = -u B ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( B x. -u 1 ) = -u B ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( ( B x. -u 1 ) mod C ) = ( -u B mod C ) ) |
| 21 | 8, 15, 20 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( ph -> ( -u A mod C ) = ( -u B mod C ) ) |
